entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 12.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low 9. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:41 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
